name: Juice Rider
description:
Grease, sludge, muck, and ooze your way to the finish line in this gooey 3d puzzle platformer. Fun for the whole family as they watch you fail miserably over and over again. Do you have what it takes to ride the juice?

Controls:
Esc: Menu
WASD: Move the character
LMB/RMB: Juice the world
Space: Jump
R: Restart level

Credits:
Bjartur Hafþórsson: Game Design, coding, and project management
Róbert Andri Grímsson: Game Design, visuals, sound and level design
Sævar Snorrason: Game Design, visuals, sound and level design

Special thanks:
Björn Snær Löve: Music
Hinrik Gylfason: Material assistance
